title: Psychology at PES rr campus
content:
I was presented an ultimatum to join pes or give it up, i passed the interview,got the acceptance letter, but the issue is 
Shud i join here or ryt other entrances? 
Since pes is more eng oriented idk if this is a well suited clg for psychology (job and academic related)
Plis do help me :)

comments.body: They should take their own lectures, coz they suck at understanding basic psychology for students.
so its not worth taking ryt? rather go to christ or jain?
Forget other fields, PES is not worth it except for CS and CS-AIML in BTech itself.
yes ive heard :( and ive been given an ultimatum to either secure seat in PES by feb first week or give it up, shud i prep for christ?
Wherever you go be it pes or any other college on this earth , chud gaye guru is permanent. ðŸ’¯
